wikipedia_page.main: David Haines (born 1969 in Nottingham) is an English artist who lives and works in Amsterdam. He is known for his videos and large scale pencil drawings on paper.

response: Artists who have released material on Sigma Editions include Parmentier, Rosy Parlane, Dion Workman, Minit, David Haines, Julien Ottavi, Vladislav Delay, and Joyce Hinterding.
* David Haines (aid worker) (1970–2014), British humanitarian aid worker
